committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: A bill to limit the number of days a depository institution may restrict the availability of funds which are deposited by check or any other similar instrument.

summary.text: Entitles an individual to withdraw funds deposited by check or other similar instrument in such individual's account at a depository institution: (1) not later than one business day after deposit, if such deposit was a check or other similar instrument issued by the Federal Government or any State or local government; and (2) not later than four business days after deposit, if it was a check or other similar instrument issued by anyone other than the Federal Government or any State or local government.

titles.title: A bill to limit the number of days a depository institution may restrict the availability of funds which are deposited by check or any other similar instrument.
